name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"548c654d-9602-4682-81a5-420fb2dfe3a4","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":1,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"formats","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d086818f-eb4d-47b4-a914-591e628877dc","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Overview","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d844b2fc-fb62-4711-bddb-e1061ac469f7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"formats","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" folder contains formatter implementations responsible for transforming raw output produced by call graph and analysis generators into structured, consumable representations. These formatters act as an abstraction layer between low-level generation logic and higher-level consumers such as analysis tools, visualizers, or exporters.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a3033c6a-1c06-45cb-b091-e89d865916cc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Each formatter in this directory follows a common contract defined in the base module, ensuring consistent behavior and interchangeability. This design allows different output formats to coexist while sharing a unified interface.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"521ad253-5397-45a4-b25c-9b83527595e2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bb644f22-9269-45a3-bff4-3f22e78cde28","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"formats","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" folder is to:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1e75b959-a21a-4b5e-9618-eff83567f679","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Normalize and structure generator output.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e6853d59-f44e-4546-8b69-9d6d7d744899","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Provide multiple representations of the same underlying data.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5a2dbfe6-13b0-419c-8e91-fb35fb0aaa45","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Encapsulate formatting logic separately from generation logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b9a74c1e-2927-40d0-973d-e0e3e5c855a0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Enable easy extension by adding new formatter implementations.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f8f27513-a884-4b50-b1e0-eb825ee88c18","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Contents","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9a8bf087-3387-4fac-a98a-640860fae1b4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__.py

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Marks the directory as a Python package and enables organized imports of formatter implementations.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"26a7849f-eacc-49e1-973f-02d0e311b675","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"base.py

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Defines the core abstractions and shared interfaces that all formatter classes must follow. This file establishes the contract that ensures consistency across different formatter implementations.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8a23b485-880d-43b5-9a41-3e99eb6a4e86","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"simple.py

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Provides a minimal formatter that converts generator output into a plain Python dictionary of lists. It serves as a lightweight and generic option for consumers that require minimal processing.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"271adfcf-8e52-48af-a84f-0aac1d59bd34","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"fasten.py

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Implements a formatter that produces FASTEN-compliant output for Python call graph data. It structures modules, dependencies, class hierarchies, and call relationships according to the FASTEN specification.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9680910b-bcc2-4f47-9ea9-97b85ce3731b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"as_graph.py

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Defines a formatter that generates an abstract AS (Autonomous System) graph representation. It bridges raw call graph data and higher-level consumers by producing a clean, dictionary-based graph structure.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9e7ebd7c-67ac-4bf5-8397-83af7d42d1a6","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Notes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"55dda6ac-0841-4ce6-8d2b-3f13216e9513","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Formatter implementations in this folder are intentionally decoupled from the logic that generates the underlying data. This separation of concerns improves maintainability, promotes reuse, and makes it easier to introduce new output formats without modifying existing generators.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1a370c6e-82e4-4b1c-ba5a-6c06fcb647e6","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Extensibility","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4b87a67e-7b00-4d95-bc3a-ffe28f2fab3c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"New formatters can be added to this folder by implementing the base formatter interface. As long as the contract defined in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"base.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is respected, additional formats can seamlessly integrate with the existing system.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d90ef00e-746a-4e7e-a2a6-8e28144f8ddc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
